programme.title: A Category Five Hurricane
programme.short_synopsis: Whilst waiting for hurricane Isabel, Alistair Cooke tells a few tales.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke tells us two stories because in times of great stress - and waiting for hurricane Isabel is stressful - people have told stories.
